profile.title: Yuzar Profil
profile.mustLogin: Yu for log in bifor yu go si di settings.
profile.autoTranslate: Mek mesij dem translet by demsef
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Sho di orinaj an di translet mesij
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Sho orinaj wit di translet wan side by side
profile.filterExplicit: Tek out bad or dirty kontekst
profile.disappearingMessages: Mek mesij dem go away afta taim
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sekon dem bifor mesij go delete by itself
profile.saveError: Error: Nɔ bin fɔ sef di settings
profile.noPrivateKey: No private key de pan dis divais fo export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Put wan paswod fo protekt yu backup:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Put di paswod fo dis backup:
profile.importSuccess: Private key don import inside dis divais.
profile.importFailed: Import nor wok (paswod rong or fael spoil).
profile.keysRotated: New key don mek, an public key don upload.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Yu private key nor de lef dis divais. Yu fit export wan copy we get paswod fo restore pan oda divais.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Yu de pan Free plan — yu fit use di Sun/Moon opshɔn we de bɛlo. Upgrade fo get mo theme.
profile.backupDesc: Mek backup fo yu key dem wit paswod, an restore am pan oda divais fo sync.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Blor wen app nor de use
profile.notifyOnCopy: Tel mi if smbody copy mi mesij
profile.followHint: If dem post wit 'Followers' or 'Public', yu go si dem story insay yu Following feed.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sometin nor go rite insay dis section.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Forwad kol an text dem to yu confirm fone or email. Kol/text we komot go show yu Chatforia nomba.

chat.selectPrompt: Chuz wan text or chat rum fo stat tok
